title: Supreme Expansion Boards / Insu-reflector / Insu-shield / Insu-board
fulldescription: High-performance expansion joint boards and reflective insulation products designed to accommodate structural movement and thermal variation. They help prevent cracks while improving building energy efficiency. Ideal for roofs, walls, and concrete expansion joints in residential and industrial structures.

title: Backer Rods / Thermal Insulators
fulldescription: Flexible backer rods control sealant depth and improve joint durability, while thermal insulators reduce heat transfer in buildings. Together they enhance sealing performance and energy efficiency. Widely used in glazing, façade joints, and insulated construction systems.

title: Light Weight Filling Material
fulldescription: A low-density filling material used to reduce structural dead load without compromising strength. It provides excellent thermal and sound insulation properties. Commonly used in sunken slabs, roof fillings, and lightweight construction applications.

title: Water Stoppers
fulldescription: Durable PVC water stoppers designed to prevent water leakage through construction and expansion joints. They are essential in water-retaining and underground structures. Provides long-lasting waterproof protection in basements, tanks, and dams.

title: Concrete/Mortar Waterproofing Admixtures
fulldescription: Integral waterproofing compounds that reduce permeability when added to concrete or mortar. They enhance durability and protect structures from water damage over time. Ideal for foundations, slabs, tanks, and moisture-exposed construction.

title: Acrylic/Polymer Crack Filler
fulldescription: A ready-to-use polymer-based filler designed to seal surface cracks and prevent water ingress. It remains flexible and weather-resistant after curing. Suitable for walls, terraces, and concrete repair works.

title: Mould Release Agents / Curing Compounds
fulldescription: Mould release agents ensure smooth demoulding of concrete surfaces, while curing compounds retain moisture for proper hydration. Together they improve surface finish and concrete strength. Used extensively in precast and on-site concrete works.

title: Polymer Modified Repair Mortars
fulldescription: High-strength repair mortars enhanced with polymers for superior bonding and durability. Designed for restoring damaged concrete structures and surfaces. Ideal for beams, columns, slabs, and rehabilitation projects.

title: Polymer Modified Water Resistant and Bonding Agents
fulldescription: Advanced bonding agents that improve adhesion between old and new concrete surfaces. They also enhance water resistance and reduce shrinkage cracks. Commonly used in repair, plastering, and floor topping works.

title: Acrylic and Polymer Modified Flexible Waterproofing Membrane
fulldescription: A seamless, flexible waterproof coating that protects surfaces from moisture penetration. It accommodates minor structural movement without cracking. Suitable for terraces, bathrooms, balconies, and wet areas.

title: Self Adhesive Waterproofing / Thermal Insulation / Sound Proof Membrane
fulldescription: Multi-functional peel-and-stick membrane offering waterproofing, thermal insulation, and sound reduction. Easy to install with strong adhesion to most surfaces. Ideal for roofs, basements, and foundation protection.

title: Expanding Grout Admixtures
fulldescription: Specialized expanding grout admixtures designed for precision grouting beneath base plates and foundations. They ensure void-free filling and strong load transfer. Used in machinery foundations and structural supports.

title: Non-shrink Free Flow Grouts
fulldescription: High-performance non-shrink grouts that maintain volume and provide superior strength. They flow easily into gaps for effective structural support. Suitable for heavy equipment bases and industrial applications.

title: Tile Fixing / Tile Over Tile Laying Adhesives
fulldescription: Polymer-modified tile adhesives providing strong, long-lasting bonding for wall and floor tiles. Can be applied over existing tiles in renovation projects. Suitable for kitchens, bathrooms, and exterior tiling.

title: Waterproofed Filler Materials
fulldescription: Moisture-resistant filler materials designed to seal joints, gaps, and voids in construction. They prevent water penetration and enhance durability. Used in repair and waterproofing systems.

title: Bonding Agents / Repair Mortars
fulldescription: A comprehensive range of bonding agents and repair mortars for structural rehabilitation. They improve adhesion and restore the integrity of damaged concrete. Suitable for both residential and industrial repair works.

title: Anti-Skid / Smooth Top Self-leveling Epoxy Floorings
fulldescription: Durable epoxy flooring systems available in anti-skid and smooth self-leveling finishes. Resistant to chemicals, abrasion, and heavy traffic. Ideal for hospitals, factories, parking areas, and clean rooms.

title: Industrial Flooring Systems
fulldescription: Heavy-duty flooring systems designed for industrial environments with high load and traffic. Provides excellent strength, durability, and easy maintenance. Used in warehouses, workshops, and production areas.

title: Protective / Chemical Resistant Coating
fulldescription: Specialized coatings that protect surfaces from corrosion, chemicals, and moisture. They extend the service life of structures in harsh environments. Ideal for plants, storage tanks, and industrial floors.

title: Polyurethane / Polysulphide / Acrylic / Silicon Sealants
fulldescription: A wide range of sealants designed for expansion joints, glazing, and perimeter sealing. They provide flexibility, weather resistance, and long-term performance. Suitable for doors, windows, façades, and structural joints.

title: Anchor Grouts
fulldescription: High-strength grouts used for anchoring bolts and structural elements into concrete. They provide strong load transfer and long-term stability. Ideal for machinery foundations and structural anchoring.

title: Roofing Insulation
fulldescription: Efficient roofing insulation materials that reduce heat transfer and improve indoor comfort. They enhance energy efficiency and building performance. Suitable for residential, commercial, and industrial roofs.
